about_the_game:
Bring all the cozy Christmas vibes to your bakery this season and embrace the holiday spirit. From snowfall outside your bakery to a cute little tree you get to decorate, you'll be feeling festive in no time—and so will your customers!


Deck the halls of your bakery by putting up decorations like tinsel, garlands, and fun Christmas cutouts. Choose between different colors and styles to capture the kind of Christmas you love.


Discover all the fun Christmas baked goods from cute sugar cookies, fancy cakes, charming pies, fun donuts and so much more! Enough recipes to fill your bakery to the brim with holiday cheer.


As you bake and sell festive recipes you'll earn 'Christmas Tickets' that you can collect and spend in the Christmas Shop.


Spend your tokens to unlock Christmas recipes and festive shop decorations for the inside and outside of your bakery!


Unlock the different tree types and choose your favorite. Decorate it with a fun mix of different baubles, tinsels, and lights to make your shop feel like home.


Once your tree is up you can cover it in candy canes to give to your customers. They may even leave you a little gift to say thanks!


Nothing says "Christmas Bakery" like gumdrops and mini candy canes, am I right? Find those and a few other festive ingredients to play with.


Don't forget to bundle up before you go outside to decorate or put up Christmas lights—it's snowing out there!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 700 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 700 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
